mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, s.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name as studentsName, b.title, b.content, IFNULL(DATE(b.update_at),"-") as updateAt, DATE(b.create_at) as createAt, b.cnt FROM board AS b INNER JOIN students AS s ON b.students_id = s.students_id ORDER BY boardId DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
